name: Bacon Run 3D
description:
You're abducted by Aliens, and your only hope of escaping is to subject yourself to their endless Rat-Race Experiments... except the rat is YOU!

Bacon Run 3D is a First Person Maze Game, putting you face-first into over 25 increasingly difficult maps with one goal... 

FIND. THE. BACON.

*NOTE: This is the freely available version of Bacon Run 3D developed for the One Game A Month Challenge. A full version with over 150+ new levels and challenges will be available for sale Q2 2014.
